item.title: 早间竞价美国核心通胀无假期
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，波音最大的工会寻求在飞机制造商董事会中占有一席之地
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周一报道，波音公司最大的工会--国际机械师协会 751 区--正在寻求该飞机制造商的董事会席位。【原文：Boeing's largest labor union, the International Association of Machinists District 751, is seeking a board seat at the plane maker, the Financial Times reported on Monday.】

item.title: 新加坡 2 月核心通胀率按年升至 3.6%，创 2023 年 7 月以来新高
item.description: 官方数据周一显示，新加坡2月份核心通胀率同比上升3.6%，高于预期，创下2023年7月以来的最高值，原因是医疗保健和娱乐商品及服务成本上升。【原文：Singapore's core inflation rose 3.6% in February from a year earlier, official data showed on Monday, above estimates and the highest since July 2023 amid a rise in the cost of healthcare and recreation goods and services.】

item.title: 大型连锁酒店和无品牌酒店业主发现彼此需要对方
item.description: 由于高利率打击了酒店业，导致新酒店建设放缓，独立酒店运营商和全球连锁巨头正越来越多地通过特许经营协议建立联系。【原文：Independent hotel operators and giant global chains are increasingly linking up in franchise agreements as high-interest rates have slammed the hospitality industry, slowing down new hotel construction.】

item.title: 数据显示，亚洲私募股权交易将迎来 2015 年以来最糟糕的第一季度
item.description: 数据显示，由于中国交易冷淡以及更广泛的经济和地缘政治不确定性拖累了市场情绪，亚洲私募股权支持的并购活动将迎来近十年来最差的开局。【原文：Private equity-backed mergers and acquisitions in Asia are set for their worst start to the year in nearly a decade, as a lull in dealmaking in China and broader economic and geopolitical uncertainties dragged on sentiment, data showed.】

item.title: 地缘政治风险加剧，供应担忧加剧，石油上涨
item.description: 周一亚市早盘，油价上涨，原因是市场担心中东和俄罗斯与乌克兰之间的冲突升级会导致全球供应趋紧，而美国钻井平台数量的减少也增加了油价上涨的压力。【原文：Oil prices rose in early Asian trading on Monday on concerns over tighter global supply brought about by escalating conflicts in the Middle East and between Russia and Ukraine, while a shrinking U.S. rig count added to upward price pressure.】

item.title: 小米汽车应用在中国苹果应用商店上线
item.description: 路透社周一的调查显示，小米汽车的一款应用程序已在中国的苹果应用商店上线。【原文：An app of Xiaomi's car has been launched on Apple's App Store in China- Reuters checks showed on Monday.】

item.title: 韩国推动其市场全球化的努力受制于外汇交易历史
item.description: 在韩国寻求提升其金融市场全球形象的同时，这个出口大国正在努力放松严格的货币限制，多年来，这一直是该国投资者和交易商的一大痛点。【原文：As South Korea seeks to boost the global profile of its financial markets, the export powerhouse is struggling to loosen the tight currency restrictions that have for years been a major pain point for investors and traders in the country.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪下调新款海豹电动轿车起售价
item.description: 中国电动汽车（EV）制造商比亚迪周一将其新款海豹电动轿车的起售价下调至179800元（24978.12美元）。【原文：China electric vehicle (EV) maker BYD on Monday lowered the starting price of a new version of its Seal electric sedan to 179,800 yuan ($24,978.12).】

item.title: 中国将保障外资企业的国民待遇
item.description: 商务部副部长郭婷婷周一在北京的一个论坛上表示，中国将保障外资企业的国民待遇，让更多的外资企业放心、安心地在中国投资。【原文：China will safeguard national treatment for foreign-funded firms, so that more foreign-funded enterprises can invest in the country with confidence and peace of mind, said Commerce Vice Minister Guo Tingting on Monday at a forum in Beijing.】

item.title: 干预威胁抑制美元兑日元升至新高
item.description: 尽管日本当局的货币干预威胁阻止了美元进一步北上，但美元在周一表现抢眼，将日元压制在数十年低点附近。【原文：The dollar was on the front foot on Monday and kept the yen pinned near a multi-decade low, though the threat of currency intervention from Japanese authorities prevented the greenback from heading further north.】

item.title: 地缘政治风险加剧，供应担忧加剧，油价上涨
item.description: 周一亚市早盘，油价上涨，原因是人们担心中东和俄罗斯与乌克兰之间的冲突升级会导致全球供应收紧，而美国钻井平台数量的缩减也增加了油价上涨的压力。【原文：Oil prices rose in early Asian trading on Monday on concern over tighter global supply brought about by escalating conflict in the Middle East and between Russia and Ukraine, while a shrinking U.S. rig count added to upward price pressure.】

item.title: 亚洲股市走高，日本对日元疲软持谨慎态度
item.description: 亚洲股市周一走高，因为投资者希望本周的美国通胀数据不会破坏降息前景，而日本的货币干预风险暂时阻止了日元的跌势。【原文：Asian shares inched higher on Monday as investors hoped U.S. inflation data this week would not derail the outlook for lower interest rates, while the risk of currency intervention from Japan stalled the yen's decline for the moment.】

item.title: 澳大利亚建议根据通胀率上调最低工资
item.description: 澳大利亚政府将支持今年根据通货膨胀率上调最低工资，因为低收入家庭仍在努力解决生活成本问题，尽管随着通货膨胀率的放缓，上调幅度将有所缩小。【原文：Australia's government will support a minimum wage increase in line with inflation this year as low-income families continue to grapple with costs of living, although the rise would be smaller as inflation eased.】

item.title: 早间竞价：央行敏感股面临一周数据
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 澳大利亚澳新银行集团以 3740 万美元和解信用卡集体诉讼案
item.description: 澳大利亚澳新银行集团（ANZ Group）周一表示，已同意以 5750 万澳元（约合 3744 万美元）的价格就一起与个人信用卡利息相关的集体诉讼达成和解。【原文：Australia's ANZ Group said on Monday it had agreed to settle a class action suit related to interest charged on personal credit cards for A$57.5 million ($37.44 million).】

item.title: 律师称麦当劳在斯里兰卡的门店因与合作伙伴的交易终止而关闭
item.description: 美国麦当劳公司的一名律师周日表示，麦当劳已终止了与斯里兰卡当地合作伙伴的协议，该国的 12 家分店已全部关闭。【原文：McDonald's has ended an agreement with its local partner in Sri Lanka and all 12 outlets in the country have been closed, an attorney for the U.S. company said on Sunday.】

item.title: 恒大清算人称公司、SJ和天基地撤回在美国的破产保护申请
item.description: 恒大清算人称，该公司、SJ和天基地产周五向美国法院提交文件，撤回第15章破产保护申请。【原文：Evergrande liquidators said the company, SJ and Tianji filed documents with a U.S. Court on Friday to withdraw Chapter 15 bankruptcy protection applications, the Chinese property company said in a filing to the Hong Kong Stock Exchange.】

item.title: 官员会见首席执行官，中国被告知面临 "岔路口
item.description: 国际货币基金组织总裁克里斯塔琳娜-格奥尔基耶娃（Kristalina Georgieva）周日表示，中国需要通过经济政策 "重塑自我"，以加快解决房地产市场危机，并促进国内消费和生产率的提高。【原文：China needs to "reinvent itself" with economic policies to speed resolution of its property market crisis and boost domestic consumption and productivity, the International Monetary Fund's Managing Director Kristalina Georgieva said on Sunday.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：中国禁止在政府电脑中使用英特尔和 AMD 芯片
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周日报道，中国已出台新的指导方针，这意味着英特尔和 AMD 的美国微处理器将被逐步淘汰出政府个人电脑和服务器。【原文：China has introduced new guidelines that will mean U.S. microprocessors from Intel and AMD are phased out of government personal computers and servers, the Financial Times reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 中国计划制定新的市场准入规则：李总理致全球首席执行官
item.description: 中国国务院总理李强周日对全球首席执行官和中国政策制定者表示，中国将认真研究市场准入和跨境数据流动问题，并将很快在这些领域出台新的法规。【原文：China will carefully study issues of market access and cross-border data flows and will soon issue new regulations in these areas, Premier Li Qiang told an audience of global CEOs and Chinese policymakers on Sunday.】

item.title: 全球监管机构将矛头指向科技公司，谷歌和苹果的分手已提上日程
item.description: 随着大西洋两岸的反垄断监管机构严厉打击涉嫌反竞争的行为，大型科技公司正面临数十年来最大的挑战。【原文：Big Tech is facing its biggest challenge in decades as antitrust regulators on both sides of the Atlantic crack down on alleged anti-competitive practices that could result in break-up orders to Apple and Alphabet's Google, a first for the industry.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，在发生安全事故后，美国联邦航空局考虑限制美联航的新航线
item.description: 据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周六报道，在发生一系列安全事故后，美国联邦航空管理局（Federal Aviation Administration）正在考虑采取措施抑制美国联合航空公司（United Airlines）的增长，包括阻止该航空公司增加新航线。【原文：The U.S. Federal Aviation Administration is considering measures to curb growth at United Airlines , including preventing the carrier from adding new routes, following a series of safety incidents, Bloomberg News reported on Saturday.】

item.title: 德国风电行业欢迎政府为离岸码头提供资金
item.description: 德国海上风能基金会表示，政府决定资助一个海上码头的扩建，这对实现海上风能的扩建目标非常重要。【原文：The German Offshore Wind Energy Foundation said the government's decision to help fund the expansion of an offshore terminal is important to achieve expansion goals for wind energy at sea.】

item.title: 联邦调查局告诉阿拉斯加航空公司 737 MAX 9 乘客他们可能是犯罪受害者
item.description: 据路透社看到的信件称，美国联邦调查局已告知阿拉斯加航空公司一架波音737 MAX 9客机上的乘客，他们可能是一起犯罪的受害者。【原文：The U.S. Federal Bureau of Investigation has told passengers who were on an Alaska Airlines Boeing 737 MAX 9 that suffered a Jan. 5 mid-air emergency that they may be victims of a crime, according to letters seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 天齐公司在智利 SQM-Codelco 锂交易中寻求股东投票权
item.description: 中国天齐锂业公司周五敦促智利SQM公司就正在与国营铜矿商Codelco讨论的锂交易举行股东投票，并批评谈判缺乏明确性。【原文：China's Tianqi Lithium Corp on Friday urged Chile's SQM to hold a shareholders vote over a lithium deal under discussion with state-run copper miner Codelco, and criticized a lack of clarity in the negotiations.】

item.title: 为什么我需要一个全黑人演员阵容？迪士尼批评佩尔茨的言论
item.description: 华特迪士尼公司（Walt Disney Co）周五表示，激进投资者纳尔逊-佩尔茨（Nelson Peltz）批评该公司拍摄以女性和黑人演员为主的电影的言论，证明他不应该进入迪士尼董事会。【原文：Walt Disney Co on Friday said that remarks by activist investor Nelson Peltz criticizing the company for making movies dominated by female and Black actors is evidence that he shouldn't be on Disney's board.】

item.title: 鸽派美联储提振美国股市涨势
item.description: 令人欣慰的经济前景和美联储发出的鸽派信号正鼓励投资者将目光投向过去一年推动美国股市上涨的大型成长股和科技股之外。【原文：A reassuring economic outlook and dovish signals from the Federal Reserve are encouraging investors to look beyond the massive growth and technology stocks that have fueled the U.S. stock market’s gains over the past year.】

item.title: 近期事件发生后，美国联邦航空局将加强对美国联合航空公司的审查
item.description: 美国联合航空公司周五晚些时候表示，在最近发生一系列安全事故后，联邦安全监管部门将在未来几周内加强对该航空公司的审查。【原文：United Airlines said late on Friday that federal safety regulators will boost scrutiny of the airline in the next several weeks after a series of recent safety incidents.】

item.title: 美联储主席博斯蒂克将年内降息幅度由之前的两次缩减为一次
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）周五表示，他现在预计今年只会降息四分之一个百分点，而之前预计的降息幅度为两次。【原文：Atlanta Federal Reserve bank President Raphael Bostic said on Friday he now expects just a single quarter-point interest rate cut this year versus two cuts that he had projected previously, a change in his outlook driven by persistent inflation and stronger-than-anticipated economic data.】
